archimate:BusinessObject.name: (Abstract) Test Specification
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This Abstract Specification corresponds to the ISA-95 object type ISA95TestSpecificationType: "This ObjectType indicates the existence of a test specification. This is typically used where a test is required to ensure capability of a modelling target such as ISA95Person." (https://reference.opcfoundation.org/ISA-95/v100/docs/7.6.4 )
See also "Test Specification Information" in https://reference.opcfoundation.org/ISA-95/v100/docs/7.2.
